executiveSummary: The MuteMe founders pitched their illuminated mute button to the Sharks, seeking $200,000 for 10% equity. While the product was recognized as innovative and first-to-market, the Sharks were concerned about pricing, market strategy, and scalability, leading all to ultimately pass on the investment.
keyDecisions: No major decisions recorded; all Sharks declined to invest.

actionItems.task: Develop a clear sales and marketing strategy, potentially leveraging TikTok and online channels
Refine cost structure to make the product more competitive for retail
Consider business-to-business sales approach using custom engraved stainless steel products

nextSteps: Founders will likely refine their product, adjust pricing, and pursue online and B2B sales channels before seeking further investment.
